cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

This paper is about response generation in chatbots, which is a common topic in the natural language processing (NLP) field. The paper proposes a new model called the hierarchical recurrent attention network (HRAN) to improve the performance of multi-turn response generation. This model involves both hierarchical attention mechanisms and recurrent neural networks, which are widely used in NLP research. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Other possible sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval), as these fields are also relevant to the proposed model and the problem of response generation in chatbots.
